name: Mistreat Fighter
description:
Mistreat Fighter is a domestic 1v1 insult fighting game  where you don't use fists but a sharp tongue against your significant other.  Choose a side in the eternal battle between men's and women's ego and have the final say!

How to play:

1. ATTACK: Both players exchange turns stating provoking remarks which will deal  different amount of damage  depending on the  opponent's mood. (so one argument might do big damage on an angry enemy but will be of no use agains a calm one. And vice versa). 

2. DEFENSE: The opponent can defend himself and reduce the damage with a proper response. Each remark has a different effective response. 

3. MOOD: Each remark and each response has a different effect on the Mood.  It's a state constantly changing  depending on what type of attacks and defenses you use. 

Happy family quarrel!

by lolfrad and badlemon
